title: Welcome to Noodle Story
subtitle: A cozy noodle shop tale
lore: You are the new chef of a small noodle shop on a busy street where travelers, locals, and seasonal visitors pass through every day.
Your goal is to build a warm reputation, learn new recipes, and turn a humble counter into a beloved neighborhood spot.
how_to_play: Check the order board, accept an order, and gather ingredients.
Buy staples at the market and forage for fresh items.
Cook the recipe the customer asked for, then serve it to earn coins and reputation.
Repeat to unlock new recipes, upgrades, staff, decor, and specializations.

core_mechanics.title: Orders
core_mechanics.text: Orders have rarities and sometimes time limits. Higher tiers pay more but can be harder to fulfill.

core_mechanics.title: Ingredients
core_mechanics.text: Ingredients come from the market and forage. Some can spoil over time, so keep an eye on your pantry.

core_mechanics.title: Cooking
core_mechanics.text: Recipes reward skillful cooking with better quality and bigger rewards.

core_mechanics.title: Progression
core_mechanics.text: Serving customers unlocks recipes and content, while upgrades and staff make the shop run smoother.

core_mechanics.title: Seasons
core_mechanics.text: Seasonal content rotates in and out, bringing limited recipes, events, and visitors.

next_steps: Start the tutorial and complete your first order.
Stock up on noodles and broth, then try cooking a classic recipe.
Claim your daily reward when it appears to keep progress steady.
